subject: Publicly accessible JUnit 3.8.x Javadoc
msgSnippet: I wanted to link my tests javadocs with JUnit 3.8.x javadocs using link parameter. I cannot find it. I found only javadocs for 4.0.x line. Is is published
messageBody: I wanted to link my tests javadocs with JUnit 3.8.x javadocs using "link" parameter. I cannot find it. I found only javadocs for 4.0.x line. Is is published somewhere?
